apollo.gui.genomemap
Interface ManagedViewI

All Superinterfaces:
ViewI
All Known Subinterfaces:
SelectViewI, TierViewI
All Known Implementing Classes:
AnnotationView, DragView, FeatureView, ManagedView, ResultView, SiteView, TierView
public interface ManagedViewI
extends ViewI

An interface representing a View object which has defined extents eg a start and end base and has a tier manager to go with it.
